name: Cuba Libre - Cuba Libre - Epicure
additionalNotes:
Rolled by Nestor Plasencia, one of Central America's top premium cigar makers and the world's single largest grower of Cuban-seed tobacco, his beloved Cuba Libre blend is a unique mix of aged Cuban seed long-fillers bound with an authentic, exquisite Corojo wrapperâ€”a wrapper selected specifically for 
Cuba Libre is characterized by its earthy, leathery flavor that has an almost chewy texture and an enjoyably long finish. The interplay of ample spicy notes with a subtle sweetness brings forth a complexity that can only be found in cigars crafted of 100% Cuban-seed tobacco. Packaged in exceedingly elegant cedar boxes of 20, Cuba Libre is a top-rated pick, and one of the industry's best values in full-flavored cigars.
